Gain 1 [E] and 1 (3) anniv5:Charge Up.
anniv5:Amplify [E] : Increase both values by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Unrelenting Form
cards.description: Once per turn, when you reach 2 or fewer cards in hand, draw 2 cards and gain  (2) [E] .

cards.name: Vial of Memory
cards.description:
Choose a card in your discard pile and return it to your hand. It costs 0 until played.
Exhaust (stslib:Exhaustive 2).

cards.name: Vision
cards.description:
Put 1 (2) card (cards) from your draw pile into your hand.
Retain your hand this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Visit a Monastery
cards.description:
(Innate.) At the start of your next 3 turns, add into your hand:
Madness, Purity,
Apotheosis.

cards.name: Voracious Sigil
cards.description:
(Innate.)
anniv5:Absorb a random Skill in your hand. Play all the cards this has anniv5:Absorbed.

cards.name: Wisdom
cards.description:
Gain [E] ( [E]).
Discard any number of cards in your hand. Draw that many cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Witchcraft
cards.description:
Steal 7 (9) HP from the enemy. If Fatal, obtain a Potion that gives 8 Temporary_HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Xpansion
cards.description:
Gain X anniv5:Duplication.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

relics.name: Handy Haversack
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

relics.name: Blue Skull
relics.description: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 2 additional Focus.
relics.flavorText: A small skull, oddly blue with no signs of dye or paint.

relics.name: P.M. Booster Pack
relics.description: Upon pickup, add any one card from a random Packmaster Booster to your deck.
relics.flavorText: A package of cards in a foil wrapper. How did it end up in the Spire?

relics.name: Snowglobe
relics.description: Whenever you apply anniv5:Frostbite by attacking an enemy, apply 1 more.
relics.flavorText: A depiction of the Spire during snowy weather. It growls when you shake it.

relics.name: Gem of Unity
relics.description: Once per combat, after you have played a card from each different Pack available this run, gain 20 Block, 1 Strength, 1 Dexterity, and heal 5 HP.

relics.name: Mini Hakkero
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain 2 anniv5:Charge Up.
relics.flavorText: A small elemental furnace, generates enough heat and energy to destroy a mountain.

relics.name: P.M. Booster Box
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 1 of 3 Packmaster Boosters, three times. Earn an additional card from these boosters at the end of each combat.
relics.flavorText: Better price for buying in bulk.

relics.name: Bag of Holding
relics.description:
Replaces HandyHaversack.
Gain [E] at the start of each turn, lasting one turn for every 5 cards in your deck.
relics.flavorText: "Incredible! It appears that this bag connects to an extradimensional space. What if I jump inside?" - Ranwid

relics.name: Collector Badge
relics.description: Each turn, after you play a card from 3 different Packs, gain [E] next turn.

relics.name: Banishing Decree
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose one of your Packs. Cards from it will no longer appear in card rewards. Then, choose 1 of 5 new Packs to replace it with, and obtain 3 card rewards from that Pack.
relics.flavorText: Absorb what is useful, reject what is useless and add what is essentially your own.

relics.name: Dimension Core
relics.description: At the start of combat, for every 10 cards in your deck, shuffle 3 different color cards into your draw pile. Draw an extra card each turn.
relics.flavorText: A crystal sphere containing infinite possibilities. It's cracked.

relics.name: P.M. Collection
relics.description: Upon pickup, you may add each card from a random Packmaster Booster to your deck.
relics.flavorText: Said to have been assembled by a consortium of wizards.

relics.name: Tarred Feather
relics.description:
Raise your max hand size by 2.
At the start of each combat, add 2 Weights into your hand.
relics.flavorText: You wouldn't want to meet its previous wearer.

potions.name: Modder's Delight
potions.description: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. Put 3 random cards from different Packs from your draw pile into your hand.

potions.name: Booster Brew
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 Packs. Add 5 random cards from it into your draw pile. They cost 0 this combat.

potions.name: Smithing Oil
potions.description: Choose 1 card in your hand to Upgrade permanently.

keywords.name: Confession
keywords.description:
Whenever you take damage or lose HP, deal damage equal to your Confession to ALL enemies.
If it isn't your turn, reduce Confession by half.

keywords.name: Crescent Moon
keywords.description: Orb. Passive: Deals damage to a random enemy when activated by a card's effect. Evokes after activating 4 times. Evoke: Deal damage to a random enemy.

keywords.name: Critical Hit
keywords.description: Critical Hits deal 50% more damage.

keywords.name: Croquette
keywords.description: A Retained 0 cost consumable tokens that provides a resource.

keywords.name: Fallout
keywords.description: Whenever you play a Power, ALL creatures with Fallout take damage.

keywords.name: Fire Spirit
keywords.description: Orb: Apply Ignite to ALL enemies. Gain Focus when evoked.

keywords.name: Full Moon
keywords.description: Orb. Passive: Draw 1 card when activated by a card's effect. Evokes after activating 4 times. Evoke: Draw 1 card.

keywords.name: Glass Armor
keywords.description: At the end of the turn, gain Block. When taking unblocked attack damage, remove this.

keywords.name: Inscribed
keywords.description: When played, activate the passive of your next Orb, then of all Full and Crescent Moon Orbs.

keywords.name: Light
keywords.description:
Orb - Passive: At the end of your turn gain 1 Confession.
Evoke: Gain 3 Confession.

keywords.name: Magnetized
keywords.description: When you play or discard a Magnetized card, gain 1 Polarity and Magnetize another random card (excluding Unplayable cards) in your hand.

keywords.name: Mundane
keywords.description: Cards that are neither rare, nor uncommon.

keywords.name: Panda
keywords.description: Orb: Deals damage to a random enemy at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Penance
keywords.description:
When a creature obtains 8 Penance, it loses 20 HP and loses 8 Penance.
HP loss from Penance is increased by 10 this combat.

keywords.name: Plated Armor
keywords.description: At the end of the turn, gain Block. When taking unblocked attack damage, reduce by 1.

keywords.name: Polarity
keywords.description: Upon gaining 10 Polarity, gain [E] .

keywords.name: Rainbow Louse
keywords.description: Orb: Draw 1 card at the start of your turn. When Evoked, draw 2 cards.

keywords.name: Stun
keywords.description: Stunned enemies skip their turn.

keywords.name: Swarm Of Bees
keywords.description: Orb: Deals damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Absorb
keywords.description: Exhaust a card. When this card is exhausted, add all cards it absorbed to your hand.

keywords.name: Addiction
keywords.description: After a number of turns, add 2 Despairs to your hand and lose 5 Strength.

keywords.name: Advantage
keywords.description: Roll Dice an additional number of times and take the highest value of the rolls.

keywords.name: Aggression
keywords.description: In this stance, your Attacks deal 25% more damage. Upon exiting this Stance, gain 2 Strength.

keywords.name: Amplify
keywords.description: If you have enough [E] pay the additional cost to activate the effect.

keywords.name: Ancient
keywords.description:
Stance: If you have less than 6 Plated Armor at the start of your turn, gain 2 Plated Armor.
When you leave this Stance, gain 1 Artifact.

keywords.name: Angry
keywords.description: Your Attacks deal 50% more damage and you take 50% more damage from attacks. Upon exiting this Stance, gain 3 Vigor.

keywords.name: Art Card
keywords.description: The art half of a ripped card. It does nothing and always exhausts.

keywords.name: Ascend
keywords.description: On Ascending, gain [E] [E] , draw 2 cards and gain 10 Strength that turn.

keywords.name: Basic
keywords.description: Basic cards are the cards that you find in decks at the start of the run. They have the same border as Common cards but cannot be obtained through normal means.

keywords.name: Bind
keywords.description: Creatures with Bind deal reduced damage with their next attack.

keywords.name: Blaze
keywords.description: Orb: Increases amount every turn. When Evoked, applies Ignite to the enemy with the most HP.

keywords.name: Boost
keywords.description: Add an effect to a card. This effect is removed at the end of your turn or after playing the card.

keywords.name: Bounty
keywords.description: Normal Enemy: 15 gold. Elite Enemy: 40 gold. Boss: 100 gold.

keywords.name: Buried
keywords.description: A class card (not Colorless, Status, or Curse) from your exhaust pile.

keywords.name: Casts When Drawn
keywords.description: When drawn or put into your hand, activate this card's effects on a random target. (This does not trigger on play effects such as Beat of Death.)

keywords.name: Chance
keywords.description: Chance cards are played when drawn, and Exhaust when played.

keywords.name: Charge Up
keywords.description: At 6 or more stacks, double the damage of the next Attack and lose 6 stacks.

keywords.name: Consume
keywords.description: Consuming a card transforms it into Hot Ash. Curse, Status, and Hot Ash cards can't be consumed.

keywords.name: Cunning
keywords.description: When you enter this Stance, gain 3 Vigor for each unique debuff among ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Dice
keywords.description: Dice increase the damage and Block of the next card you play that deals damage or Blocks.

keywords.name: Different Color
keywords.description: Any color other than your character's normal card color. Different Packmaster Packs are not different colors.

keywords.name: Distortion
keywords.description: Creatures with Distortion lose HP whenever a card is Exhausted, then lose 1 Distortion.

keywords.name: Duplication
keywords.description: Your next X cards are played twice.

keywords.name: Echo
keywords.description: Add a copy of this card with Exhaust and Ethereal to your hand.

keywords.name: Enraged
keywords.description: At the end of the turn that no enemy intends to attack you, gain 2 Strength.

keywords.name: Entropy
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, discard a random card, draw 1 card, and lose 1 Entropy.

keywords.name: Even
keywords.description: Additional effect if you played an even number of cards this turn (including this).

keywords.name: Evolve
keywords.description: Evolving cards can be Upgraded up to 3 times. They are Upgraded this combat whenever the listed condition is met while the card is in your hand and gain bonus effects when fully Upgraded.

keywords.name: Feral damage
keywords.description: Deals 50% additional damage to enemies with a debuff.

keywords.name: First
keywords.description: Additional effect if this is the first card played this turn.

keywords.name: Flow
keywords.description: When you Flow, you may discard any number of cards. Draw half that many at the start of your next turn.

keywords.name: Flurry
keywords.description: Specified effect triggers every time you play a card this turn.

keywords.name: Freeze
keywords.description: Grant a playable card Unplayable and Retain and raise its cost by 1. Reduce its cost by 1 at the end of each turn. Becomes Unfrozen when its cost reaches 0, and remains 0 until the card is played.

keywords.name: Front damage
keywords.description: Deals 50% additional damage to enemies with Block.

keywords.name: Frostbite
keywords.description:
At the start of its turn, a creature with Frostbite loses HP and its Frostbite is halved.
Whenever a creature with Frostbite receives attack damage, apply 1 Frostbite.

keywords.name: Gem
keywords.description: At Rest Sites, you may spend 25 Gold to socket a Gem as a free action, permanently Modifying a card that costs 1 or more in your deck with 'this Gem's effects'.

keywords.name: Ghostflame
keywords.description: Orb: Deals damage to ALL enemies. Has no Evoke effect if its passive has not been triggered yet.

keywords.name: Hoard
keywords.description: When played, reduce Hoard by X (the card's cost). When Hoard reaches 0, its effects trigger.

keywords.name: Hunted
keywords.description: Takes 10% more damage for each stack of Hunted on them. When applied, all other hunted enemies are no longer hunted, and other enemies take 10% less damage for each stack. Reduces by 1 each turn.

keywords.name: Ignite
keywords.description: Ignited creatures lose 1 HP per stack at the start of their turn.

keywords.name: Infest
keywords.description: At the end of your turn, if this is in your hand, shuffle it into your draw pile and put an infestation counter on it.

keywords.name: Inspiration
keywords.description: Inspiration increases the damage and Block of the next card played by a percentage. Stacks additively.

keywords.name: Invincible
keywords.description:
You cannot lose more than a given amount of HP in a single turn.
At the end of any round in which Invincible prevented HP loss, remove it.

keywords.name: Jail
keywords.description: You cannot play Attacks or take damage this turn.

keywords.name: Jinx
keywords.description: Jinxed enemies lose HP whenever they receive a debuff.

keywords.name: Leprechaun
keywords.description: Orb: Rolls Dice. When Evoked, applies Jinx to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Locked
keywords.description: Locked cards are unplayable.

keywords.name: Locking
keywords.description: Locking cards become Unplayable once played.

keywords.name: Lowest Rarity
keywords.description: Prioritizes cards that have been in your deck longest. Starter cards count as common. Special cards count as rare. Curses are ignored.

keywords.name: Manifest
keywords.description: Gain an Orb slot then channel the listed Orb.

keywords.name: MEGAthereal
keywords.description: Exhausts at the end of the turn, no matter where it is.

keywords.name: Metallicize
keywords.description: Gain Block at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Modify
keywords.description: Alter a card for the rest of combat. Modified cards cannot be modified again until the combat ends.

keywords.name: Muddle
keywords.description: Randomize a card's cost between 0 and 3.

keywords.name: Mutable
keywords.description: When a card is Transmuted, any Mutable effect is passed on to the next card for the rest of combat.

keywords.name: Nightmare
keywords.description:
In this Stance, lose 1 Sanity whenever you play a card, and draw 2 cards when you play a Lunacy.
Exit this Stance at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Nonlethal
keywords.description: Non-lethal damage will leave targets at 1 HP.

keywords.name: Not Hunted
keywords.description: Takes 10% less damage from attacks for each stack. Reduces by 1 each turn. When the hunted enemy dies, remove this.

keywords.name: Oblivion
keywords.description: Orb: When evoked, applies Ruin to the enemy with the most HP. Increases Ruin applied whenever you discard a card.

keywords.name: Occult
keywords.description: Occult cards can be played disregarding any conditions for playability. Cards played this way are Exhausted.

keywords.name: Odd
keywords.description: Additional effect if you played an odd number of cards this turn (including this).

keywords.name: On Fire
keywords.description: Play an additional time for each Fire Counter and Exhaust. Increase Fire Counter by 1 at the end of your turn while in your hand.

keywords.name: Petra
keywords.description: When you attack a target with Petra, gain Block equal to 35% of unblocked damage dealt on your next turn. Reduced by 1 at the end of turn.

keywords.name: Pickup
keywords.description: Effect triggers when you obtain this card.

keywords.name: Polar
keywords.description: Orb: Applies Frostbite to random enemies. When Evoked, applies Frostbite to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Porcupine
keywords.description: Orb: Generates Quills. When Evoked, gain Thorns.

keywords.name: Precision
keywords.description: Your next Attack gains additional damage for the rest of combat.

keywords.name: Randomized Orb
keywords.description: When this card is created, the Orb it channels is randomly chosen from Lightning, Dark, Ghostflame, Blaze, and Polar.

keywords.name: Reaper's Mark
keywords.description: Whenever 3 stacks are applied, they are removed and the creature loses HP equal to 40% of its missing HP.

keywords.name: Rend
keywords.description: Receives more damage from attacks equal to Rend. Reduced by half at end of round.

keywords.name: Reroll
keywords.description: Dice are not used up when you play this card.

keywords.name: Rippable
keywords.description: Right click this card to separate its effect from its cost and make both halves Exhaust.

keywords.name: Ruin
keywords.description: The next time a creature with Ruin takes unblocked attack damage, they lose HP equal to their Ruin for each buff and debuff they have.

keywords.name: Sanity
keywords.description:
While you have negative Sanity, lose 1 at the start of each turn.
For every 5 Sanity you lose, add a Lunacy to your hand, then gain 5 Sanity.

keywords.name: Serene
keywords.description: In this Stance, Block is not removed at the start of your turn. Upon exiting this Stance, double your Block. Exit this Stance at the start of your next turn.

keywords.name: Sharpen
keywords.description: Raises the damage dealt by all existing Claws.

keywords.name: Stitch
keywords.description: Tie this card to a random card in your hand. Whenever you play that card, this card is also played.

keywords.name: Synergy
keywords.description: Additional effect if you have cards from 2 other packs in your hand.

keywords.name: Tainted
keywords.description: Doubles any debuffs you apply to this enemy.

keywords.name: Text Card
keywords.description: The text half of a ripped card. It always exhausts.

keywords.name: Transmute
keywords.description: Transforms a card in combat into any card of the same rarity available through current card rewards. The new card deals 1 more damage and gains 1 more Block for the rest of combat. This effect stacks.

keywords.name: Unnate
keywords.description: Starts each combat at the bottom of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Unstable
keywords.description: When this card is discarded from your hand, apply its effects to you and ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Venomous
keywords.description: Your attacks deal 50% less damage, but apply 1 Weak and 2 Poison on hit.

keywords.name: Wanderbot
keywords.description: Orb: Deals damage to the frontmost enemy. Draws a card when evoked.

keywords.name: Weapon
keywords.description:
Whenever you play an attack card, one Durability of your rightmost Weapon is used and card's damage is increased by Weapon's Attack.
Orb slots are created and destroyed automatically.

keywords.name: Wolf
keywords.description: Orb: Deals damage to the enemy with the least HP. Damage is increased by the number of orbs that are Channeled. When Evoked, gain an Orb slot.
